description: A discrete version of the Mangoldt function: if n is prime then floor(log(n)) else 0.
comments: The real Mangoldt function Lambda(n) is equal to log(n) if n is prime else 0.
references: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, 1976, page 32.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
